amendment.description: To provide for appropriate coordination in the preparation of the report on contractor performance of security, intelligence, law enforcement, and criminal justice functions, and to add other congressional committee recipients for the report.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3477 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3477 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7270-7273; text: CR S7272) To provide for appropriate coordination in the preparation of the report on contractor performance of security, intelligence, law enforcement, and criminal justice functions, and to add other congressional committee recipients for the report.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3477 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3477 proposed by Senator Warner.
